definition: healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in
see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]

pinyin: Quan2 min2 Jian4 kang1 Bao3 xian3

sentences.english: So don. t lose sight of your healthy diet pyramid when you do your shopping.
sentences.chinese: 所以你購物時要記起健康飲食金字塔。

sentences.english: They become too attached to the computer screen. It isn't healthy.
sentences.chinese: 他們變得太黏在計算機屏幕前，這很不健康。

sentences.english: The positive self-concept will promote the individual mental health.
sentences.chinese: 積極的自我概念會促進個體的心理健康。

sentences.english: Today, on World Health Day, I wish you all good health.
sentences.chinese: 今天在世界衛生日，我祝願你們大家身心健康。

sentences.english: Men also receive health education and testing that could save their life.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏男士還接受一些可以救命的健康教育和檢查。

sentences.english: Gastrointestinal disorders big investigation, the health to take home.
sentences.chinese: 胃腸道疾病大排查，把健康帶回家。

sentences.english: And 40 percent said they would be more likely to address issues with their car than their health.
sentences.chinese: 的人說相比較自己的健康他們更喜歡處理車子問題。

sentences.english: Made of natural coconut, keep your lovely pets growing with healthy and fun.
sentences.chinese: 純天然椰殼製成，保證愛寵健康快樂成長。

sentences.english: Correlation analysis showed there was relationship between pet owning and health.
sentences.chinese: 相關分析表明，是否擁有寵物犬與身心健康顯著相關。

sentences.english: The white half moon at the beginning of the nail is an indicator of good thyroid health.
sentences.chinese: 在指甲底端的白色半月形，是一個甲狀腺健康的指標。

sentences.english: Health administers to peace of mind.
sentences.chinese: 健康有助於身心的安寧。

sentences.english: Goose is a grass - eating poultry, and goose is a kind of modern healthy food.
sentences.chinese: 鵝是食草家禽，鵝肉屬現代健康食品。

sentences.english: I felt, well-being of mother love.
sentences.chinese: 我感覺到，健康母親的愛。

sentences.english: Use of expired drugs can be dangerous for patients' health.
sentences.chinese: 使用過期藥物可能對病人的健康造成危害。

sentences.english: The 6th house illustrates the relationship between our health and work.
sentences.chinese: 第六宮說明了健康與工作的關係。

sentences.english: Civilized etiquette of our study is a foundation, is the healthy growth of our arms.
sentences.chinese: 文明禮儀是我們學習的根基，是我們健康成長的臂膀。

definition: to maintain good health/to raise a child or animal/curing (of concrete etc)
Changshou suburban district of Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
health protection/health care/to maintain in good health
lit. the body is the revolution's capital/fig. good health is a prerequisite for work (Mao Zedong's saying)
pinyin: shen1 ti3 shi4 ge2 ming4 de5 ben3 qian2

definition: chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly
